Translations.Text: Al Midyan ni send their frat Shu aib. Li dir O my popol worship DI; vi ne hav ali di Him. Proof ven vi your Lord Vi don plen weight plen mezur when vi meti. Ne cheat popol their dekstr! Ne corrupt ter gxi set rekt! This est put vi se vi est believers

arrogant estr his popol dir Ni evict vi O Shu aib together those who kred vi our town vi revert our religi. Li dir vi force us

quake annihilated them las them dead their hejm
